Title: ETERNA ANTIQUE SWISS WATCH ENAMEL DIAL
Description: BRAND/MAKE: ETERNA ANTIQUE SWISS WATCH ENAMEL DIAL. MODEL NAME: WRISTWATCH. CASE MADE OF/AND SIZE: ORIGINAL Chromoplated case. Size: Diameter 48.5 mm (1.90 in) (not counting the crown). Lug to lug is 57 mm (2.28 in). Thickness 14 mm (0.56 in). This watch was converted from pocket watch. CASE BACK: Case with two back lids. DIAL COLOR: ORIGINAL enamel dial, small second dial at 6. MECHANISM: ETERNA Swiss made movement#: 2571248. Working very good, very clean. This antique wristwatch has the original movement in an excellent status which was very well saved, considering age of this watch. Mechanism has been recently serviced to ensure it winds and sets smoothly while keeping great, accurate time. Antique watches generally experience an error of up to 5 minutes a day. Any accuracy of +,- 5 minutes is very good. 3-x signed ETERNA on case, movement and dial. CLASS/CRYSTAL: DOME PLASTIC GLASS. CROWN/PUSH BUTTONS: SILVER ton setting crown. BRACELET/STRAP: 20 mm (0,80 in) - as a gift for you. FUNCTIONS: TIME. Second hand at 6. ABOUT WATCH: Working, rare, vintage and collectible.
